heats.simin:
SimulationType                MonteCarlo
NumberOfCycles                1000
NumberOfInitializationCycles  1000
PrintEvery                    250
RestartFile                   no

ChargeMethod                  Ewald
CutOff                        12.0
Forcefield                    CrystalGenerator
EwaldPrecision                1e-6

UseChargesFromMOLFile yes

Framework 0
FrameworkName IRMOF-1_test
InputFileType mol
UnitCells 2 2 2
HeliumVoidFraction 0.792
ExternalTemperature 298
ExternalPressure 0.01E5 0.05E5 0.1E5 0.5E5 2.5E5

Component 0 MoleculeName             CO2
            StartingBead             0
            MoleculeDefinition       TraPPE
            IdealGasRosenbluthWeight 1.0
            TranslationProbability   1.0
            RotationProbability      1.0
            ReinsertionProbability   1.0
            SwapProbability          1.0
            CreateNumberOfMolecules  0

SimulationType                MonteCarlo
NumberOfCycles                2000
NumberOfInitializationCycles  2000
PrintEvery                    250
Restart File                  no

RemoveAtomNumberCodeFromLabel yes

CutOffVDW                     12.8
Forcefield                    UFF_FH

Framework 0
FrameworkName this_name_changes
UnitCells 2 2 2
HeliumVoidFraction 0.8000
ExternalTemperature 77
ExternalPressure 2E5


Component 0 MoleculeName            hydrogen
            StartingBead             0
            MoleculeDefinition       TraPPE
            IdealGasRosenbluthWeight 1.0
            TranslationProbability   1.0
            ReinsertionProbability   1.0
            SwapProbability          1.0
            CreateNumberOfMolecules  0

SimulationType                MonteCarlo
NumberOfCycles                1500
NumberOfInitializationCycles  1500
PrintEvery                    1500
Restart File                  no

ChargeMethod                  none
CutOff                        12.8
Forcefield                    CrystalGenerator
EwaldPrecision                1e-6

Framework 0
FrameworkName hypotheticalMOF_0
InputFileType mol
UnitCells 2 2 2
HeliumVoidFraction 0.741222
ExternalTemperature 298
ExternalPressure 35E5


Component 0 MoleculeName            methane
            StartingBead             0
            MoleculeDefinition       TraPPE
            IdealGasRosenbluthWeight 1.0
            TranslationProbability   1.0
            RotationProbability      1.0
            ReinsertionProbability   1.0
            SwapProbability          1.0
            CreateNumberOfMolecules  0

NumberOfCycles                1000
NumberOfInitializationCycles  1000
PrintEvery                    250
RestartFile                   no

ChargeMethod                  none

Framework 0
FrameworkName ZIF-8
InputFileType mol
UnitCells 2 2 2
HeliumVoidFraction 0.4951
ExternalTemperature 273
ExternalPressure 1e5

Component 0 MoleculeName        xenon
ChargeMethod                    None
IdealGasRosenbluthWeight        1.0
MoleculeDefinition              TraPPE
MolFraction                     0.20
IdentityChangeProbability       1.0
  NumberOfIdentityChanges       2
  IdentityChangesList           0 1
TranslationProbability          1.0
ReinsertionProbability          1.0
SwapProbability                 1.0
CreateNumberOfMolecules         0

Component 1 MoleculeName        krypton
ChargeMethod                    None
IdealGasRosenbluthWeight        1.0
MoleculeDefinition              TraPPE
MolFraction                     0.80
IdentityChangeProbability       1.0
  NumberOfIdentityChanges       2
  IdentityChangesList           0 1
TranslationProbability          1.0
ReinsertionProbability          1.0
SwapProbability                 1.0
CreateNumberOfMolecules         0
isotherms.molecule_forcefield: Hirschfelder, Molecular Theory of Gases and Liquids & Talu, Colloids Surf., A, 2001, 187-188, 83-93
